description:
Perfect installation but don't forget to do the extra steps in the terminal.
Dank je wel

Easy to run this and Arduino IDE and get started on programming. Scratch interface makes everything very easy, it only allows the selection of the relevant ports for each command.

Ideal for getting young students started on electronics.
summary: Perfect for young beginners to learn Arduino
